title: Trevor Milton Guilty Verdict Comes With Warning
itunes:title: Trevor Milton Guilty Verdict Comes With Warning
description:
Securities law expert James Park, a professor at UCLA Law School, discusses the implications of the guilty verdict in the case of Trevor Milton, the founder of Nikola.
Labor law expert Kate Andrias, a professor at Columbia Law School, discusses the rise of unions and a recent defamation lawsuit filed by pro-union Starbucks workers against the company.
June Grasso hosts. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
